displayName.description: The name of this Contact, suitable for display to end-users.

name.description: The broken-out components and fully formatted version of the contact's real name.

formatted.description: The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display.

familyName.description: The family name of this Contact, or "Last Name" in most Western languages.

givenName.description: The given name of this Contact, or "First Name" in most Western languages.

middleName.description: The middle name(s) of this Contact.

honorificPrefix.description: The honorific prefix(es) of this Contact, or "Title" in most Western languages.

honorificSuffix.description: The honorifix suffix(es) of this Contact, or "Suffix" in most Western languages.

nickname.description: The casual way to address this Contact in real life.

preferredUsername.description: The preferred username of this contact on sites that ask for a username.

photos.description: List of photos of this contact.

value.description: URI of a photo of this contact.

primary.description: A Boolean value indicating whether this instance of the Plural Field is the primary or preferred value of for this field.

emails.description: List of e-mail addresses of this contact.

primary.description: A Boolean value indicating whether this instance of the Plural Field is the primary or preferred value of for this field.

ims.description: Instant messaging addresses for this Contact.

value.description: Instant messaging address of this contact.

primary.description: A Boolean value indicating whether this instance of the Plural Field is the primary or preferred value of for this field.

accounts.description: Online accounts held by this Contact.

domain.description: The top-most authoritative domain for this account, e.g. "twitter.com".

username.description: An alphanumeric user name, usually chosen by the user.

urls.description: URLs of a web pages relating to this Contact.

value.description: URL of a webpage of this contact.

primary.description: A Boolean value indicating whether this instance of the Plural Field is the primary or preferred value of for this field.

aboutMe.description: A short introduction of this contact.
